summary:
I'm gonna make a really angsty au for My hero Academia just because I can.
It's an Au where All Might died during the battle...
body:
I’m gonna make a really angsty au for My hero Academia just because I can.

It’s an Au where All Might died during the battle with All for one and how the world changed for the worst after that. It takes place about 20-25 years after the anime and everyone’s moved on with their lives but there’s still a void.

reblog.comment:

It’s an Au where All Might died during the battle with All for one and how the world changed for the worst after that. It takes place about 20-25 years after the anime and everyone’s moved on with their lives but there’s still a void.

trail.content_raw:

It’s an Au where All Might died during the battle with All for one and how the world changed for the worst after that. It takes place about 20-25 years after the anime and everyone’s moved on with their lives but there’s still a void.

summary: Hey there , Nati here! I am generally VERY bad when it comes to teaching art! Which is why I just made like an animation to show...
caption:
Hey there , Nati here! I am generally VERY bad when it comes to teaching art! Which is why I just made like an animation to show the steps I go through when drawing these boys’ faces! Hope this helps a bit~ 

The still frames are below the cut!
(sorry, these are rushed and i’m not too happy about kiri but you get the idea!) 

When it comes to bodies and muscles I can only tell you to study people in real life! Use google and grab some references, and don’t be afraid to refresh your knowledge every now and then. I recently grabbed some torso refs again and practiced abs, shoulders and arms. Cause sometimes you just forget how it works and then you gotta remind yourself!

Also as annoying as it is, you HAVE to master anatomy before you can stylize it into a cartoon/anime/manga style. Learn your basic tools and then you can start messing with them <3 At least that’s my experience. 

Welp, hope this helped a bit??? I dunno, as I said, I’m really bad at explaining. I’ve been doing art for so long and I’m entirely self-taught (except for some color theory that I learned at school), so art has become an instinctive thing for me. I can’t really explain HOW I do things, I just do them at this point.

That and I take a ton of refs of the characters in the original manga/anime.

(sorry, these are rushed and i’m not too happy about kiri but you get the idea!)

summary: Help me decide I'm drawing a bnha au where Deku has a crystal body like houseki no kuni and
body:
Help me decide I’m drawing a bnha au where Deku has a crystal body like houseki no kuni and

I wanna give him a sword because obviously his body can’t endure as much force anymore so intense hand-to-hand is out. What kind of sword should he use?

1)Bort Sword

2)Normal Sword (what kind?)

3)Suggestion

And if you want him to have multiple weapon or make his life easier please comment your desired weapons and gadgets!
